p: A systematic search of the electronic databases MEDLINE/PubMed, Scopus, and Web of Science was performed from inception to 23 November 2020 by entering the following search string: (((((((cannabidiol) OR cannabinoid) OR cannabinol) OR endocannabinoid) OR tetrahydrocannabinol) OR nabilone) OR palmitoyl-ethanolamide) AND ((post-traumatic stress disorder) OR PTSD) AND treatment.
